document_data.name: ''Oil of Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Oil of armor''''' was a [[magic item|magic oil]] that toughened the skin.
document_data.Description: ''Oil of armor'' was so thin and colorless that it was practically invisible when applied.
document_data.Powers: When applied to the skin, ''oil of armor'' hardened the user's skin as if they were wearing [[armor]]. This effected lasted for seven to thirteen hours.
document_data.History: This oil was used in parts of [[Unther]] where [[priest]]s were forbidden to wear traditional armor.
